title: Historical Controversies and Revisionism - Collection 8
description:
Historical Controversies and Revisionism - Collection 8:

We have 30 titles here:

-  Baigent - Ancient Traces; Mysteries in Ancient and Early History (1998)

-  Barber & Peniston-Bird (Eds.) - History Beyond the Text; a Student's Guide to Approaching Alternative Sources (2009)

-  Barham - Napoleon wasn't Short and St. Patrick wasn't Irish; When History Get it Wrong (2014)

-  Burke - The French Historical Revolution; the Annales School, 1929-89 (1990)

-  Davies & Edelman (Eds.) - The Historian and the Bible; Essays in Honour of Lester L. Grabbe (2010)

-  Davis - America's Hidden History; Untold Tales of the First Pilgrims, Fighting Women, and Forgotten Founders Who Shaped a Nation (2008)

-  Dean - How Myth Became History; Texas Exceptionalism in the Borderlands (2016)

-  Duke - The Secret Behind Communism; the Ethnic Origins of the Russian Revolution & the Greatest Holocaust in the History of Mankind (2013)

-  Farquhar - A Treasury of Deception; Liars, Misleaders, Hoodwinkers and the Extraordinary True Stories of History's Greatest Hoaxes, .. (2005)

-  Fortenberry - Hidden Facts of the Founding Era (2012)

-  Fuentes - Race, Monogamy, and Other Lies They Told You; Busting Myths about Human Nature (2012)

-  Joseph - The Lost Treasure of King Juba; the Evidence of Africans in America before Columbus (2003)

-  King - The Real Roosevelts; an Omitted History (2015)

-  Kross - The Secret History of the United States; Conspiracies, Cobwebs and Lies (2013)

-  Leavy - Oral History; Understanding Qualitative Research (2011)

-  Lieberman (Ed.) - History in Dispute, Vol. 19; The Red Scare After 1945 (2005)

-  Linebaugh & Rediker - The Many-Header Hydra; Sailors, Slaves, Commoners, and the Hidden History of the Revolutionary Atlantic (2000)

-  Little - New Contributions to the Philosophy of History (2010)

-  Marriott - They Got It Wrong, History; All the Facts That Turned Out to Be Myths (2013)

-  McConnell (Ed.) - History in Dispute, Vol. 11; The Holocaust, 1933-1945 (2003)

-  Mowat - The Farfarers; a New History of North America (2002)

-  Pappe - The Forgotten Palestinians; a History of the Palestinians in Israel (2011)

-  Piper - Ye Shall Know the Truth; 101 Books American Nationalists Need to Read and Understand Before 'They' Burn Them (2013)

-  Ramirez - Inside the Historical Film (2014)

-  Rodda - Liars for Jesus; the Religious Rightâ€™s Alternate Version of American History, Vol. I (2006)R

-  Smart - A Search for the Truth; the Bolshevik Revolution, World War 1, World War 2 and Germany, the Holocaust Myth (2016)

-  Steers - Hoax; Hitler's Diaries, Lincoln's Assassins, and Other Famous Frauds (2013)

-  Stone & Kuznick - The Untold History of the United States; Young Readers Edition, Vol. 1, 1898-1945 (2014)

-  Winkler - The Age of Catastrophe; a History of the West, 1914-1945 (2015)

-  Wittakers - Holocaust; the Greatest Lie Every Told (2016)
